department.en: Department of Computer Science and Elec. Engineering

goal.en: This course provides a bridge between undergraduate training and modern Bayesian methods for data analysis, which is becoming the accepted research standard. Knowledge of algebra and basic calculus is a prerequisite.
goal.ch: This course provides a bridge between undergraduate training and modern Bayesian methods for data analysis, which is becoming the accepted research standard. Knowledge of algebra and basic calculus is a prerequisite.

content.en:
0. Getting Started
1. Thinking Probabilistically
2. Programming Probabilistically
3. Modeling with Linear Regression
4. Generalizing Linear Models
5. Model Comparison
6. Mixture Models
7. Gaussian Processes
8. Inference Engines
content.ch:
0. Getting Started
1. Thinking Probabilistically
2. Programming Probabilistically
3. Modeling with Linear Regression
4. Generalizing Linear Models
5. Model Comparison
6. Mixture Models
7. Gaussian Processes
8. Inference Engines

textbook.en: Osvaldo Martin, Bayesian Analysis with Python: Introduction to statistical modeling and probabilistic programming using PyMC3 and ArviZ 2nd Ed., 2018. Packt Publishing.
textbook.ch: Osvaldo Martin, Bayesian Analysis with Python: Introduction to statistical modeling and probabilistic programming using PyMC3 and ArviZ 2nd Ed., 2018. Packt Publishing.

grading.en: Written Assignments 45% (3 higher ones out of all assignments, 15% each) Final Exam 30% Final Project 25% Total 100%
grading.ch: Written Assignments 45% (3 higher ones out of all assignments, 15% each) Final Exam 30% Final Project 25% Total 100%

flex_desc.en: One week for final project presentation, and the other week for final project report.
flex_desc.ch: One week for final project presentation, and the other week for final project report.

domain.en: 人工智慧、資料科學與多媒體研究群
domain.ch: 人工智慧、資料科學與多媒體研究群

en.Assessments: Test/Exam ， Assignments ， Presentation/Oral Exam ， Research Report(printed on paper)
